name: Psychic Playground
description:
A randomly generated, open-world action game. Try and escape the confines of the Psychic Playground, a world filled with tough foes and prizes to obtain.

  • Collect materials by mining and breaking objects throughout the world, and use the materials as ammunition for psychic abilities.
  • Level-up and upgrade your stats, or find randomly hidden challenges with rejuvenating rewards. 
  • Pick and choose from a wide range of abilities available within the action battle system. What kind of strategies will you use?
